project.name: byte-monitor-labels
project.description: FNAL patch for ByteMonitor widget: adds per-LED ON/OFF text labels inside each LED circle. Provides patched ByteMonitorWidget (propOffLabel/propOnLabel properties) and ByteMonitorRepresentation (labels centered inside LEDs, per-bit state). Also patches Messages.java to add WidgetProperties_ShowWarnings required by LinearMeterWidget. This module shadows the corresponding classes from app-display-model and app-display-representation-javafx and must appear first on the product classpath.
